body.name: Blackview Android 13 Tablet 10 inch Tablet with 16GB RAM,2023 Latest Update Octa CORE Processor with 256GB Storage,5G WiFi,Dual Camera 13MP+5MP,Bluetooth,GMS,PC Mode Blue
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 5 hrs 48 mins
features: 【16(8+8Expand)+256GB+2TB TF+Octa CORE 】Blackview 10 inch Tablet is equipped with 8 GB of RAM, which can be expanded in the virtual memory up to 16 GB. Integrated storage is 256GB, and can be expanded to 2TB . This android tablet makes it easy for users to store a wide variety of data and media. The MT8788 processor is an 8-core CPU manufactured in 12nm process with up to 2.0GHz. It delivers fast and smooth performance.

【Android 13 Tablet+Doke_OS_P3.0】Tab 10 WiFi tablets for adults provides Android13 OS offers powerful personal information protection and comes with Doke OS P3.0, independently developed by a software development team of 1,000 people, which offers unique 3 finger screen shorting, low-battery notification, and data transfer notification, in addition to the usual night mode, dark mode, reader display mode, split screen, and wireless projection.

【7680mAh Long last Battery+PC Mode】 This Tablets support Battery power saving mode,built-in high-capacity 7680mAh battery, through the excellent management of the long time to make use of it, you can enjoy the video watching, games, e-books, music, etc.This 10 inch Tablets supports a convenient PC mode, which allows you to run multiple applications at the same time.

【Widevine L1+Arcsoft 13MP+Wireless Screen Casting】Blackview tablet 10 inch Support Widevine L1 and Wireless Screen Casting , so that you have a more colorful visual experience, while equipped with Arcsoft support multiple modes, Panorama mode, HDR mode, Night mode, Protrait mode, Photograph mode, allowing you to record the wonderful moments of life !

【Two-year warranty+Durable protective case+Stylus】This Tablet is a great gift for student,kids,parents,we provide 2 year warranty and 24 hours online service for any your questions on tablets.Also,we provide a free case and stylus on package for your daily using.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars blackview brand tablets (17/256gb)
reviews.reviewText: we initially purchased 2 of these devices and a couple others from another company here on Amazon... Well we ended up sending the others from the other company back and buying 3 more of these devices. So far they seem to be exactly as described, work really well, built well, have a lot of different capabilities our previous devices did not have (previously used Samsungs) and so far we've used them for movies, reading, YouTube, creations, gaming and no issues yet. So far really happy with these devices and brand! Would recommend giving them a chance!Great specs for the price & well packaged, so far amazing customer service & 2 yr warranty coverage applied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice little pad
reviews.reviewText: Pad works just as advertised. Yes it's fast just both micro 2TB card works just fine

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: El tablet esta bastante bien por el precio que lo adquiri. Necesitaba algo básico para navegación y entretenimiento y este cumple con esas 2 necesidades.Pro:-Buen precio y sobre todo cuando lo adquieres en oferta como fue mi caso.-Puedes navegar y ver peliculas con bastante calidad.-La batería dura bastante.-Espacio suficiente para almacenar contenido en sus 256gb de ROM-La RAM no es de 16gb como aparece en el anuncio y en la parte externa de la caja. Realmente, es de 8gb y puede ampliarse hasta 8gb mas.-En la caja viene todo lo que puedes necesitar como funda, protector de pantalla , cable, cargador, pinchito para abrir la bandeja contenedora de la microSD y lápiz óptico para navegar.Contra:-La resolución de pantalla es buena pero no me gusta que hasta puedo usar las uñas para poder seleccionar algo. Parece tecnología de hace varios años cuando empezaron las primeras pantallas táctiles en ese aspecto.-Sistema operativo muy básico. Si eres una persona que le gusta la personalización y funcionalidades, se queda corto.-No funciona el brillo automático. Ni el modo noche se puede programar para que se apague y encienda automáticamente.-El lápiz óptico solo te permite navegar y seleccionar, no se puede escribir con el.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value, much better quality than I expected
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as Black Friday Special - wanted to get a small and light tablet for taking notes at work, Checked out a number of Chinese brands - took a chance of this one = happy surprise. Tablet has a Fast processor, great screen quality, plenty of RAM, includes case, stylus and a screen protector - all for under $100

Vendor has promised to give full refund since it will not do what the tablet was purchased for. Although I cannot use the product I am pleased that they will refund my money without hassle. Otherwise, the tablet appears to be good purchase for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Wow! I am really impressed with this tablet.
reviews.reviewText: After returning several non working tablets (one arrived from China with a broken screen) and the others were second user devices which turned out to have major software problems so they also had to be returned. I finally decided to change tactics and go for somthing new and nearer the state of the art. I ordered the Blackview Pro 7 10inch Android tablet. It arrived from Amazon within a couple of days and I was immediately impressed by the quality of it's constuction. The screen is a very good high resolution device, it has 10 Gig of ram and is probably the fastest tablet I have ever used! It is also very easy to set up, although it would have been nice to include the type C to type C cable needed to transfer data from an Android mobile in the box as few people would own one. In short this device is exemplary and I cannot recommend it too highly. The price of about £130.00 seems to be a bargain for this level quality and performance. Only one minor problem - Android 12 seems to have done away with the arrow which takes you back a screen or closes a programme. The modern way is apparently all operated by dragging a finger across the screen. This is very troublesome to an old timer like myself but I expect I will get used to it! In short, amazingly good construction quality and performance at a very reasonable price. My advice - this must be one of the best buys available on the market and no - I have no connection with Blackview.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My partner bought one of these tablets for my son and it worked fine, was easily set up on it's Android system. I decided to buy one for my daughter, bad idea...As soon as we turned it on we realised text to speech was activated, odd considering this wasn't the case with the one my partner bought. The touch screen was barely responding to input, making it almost impossible to get through setup. After finally adding my daughter's account I had to fight a barely functioning touchscreen to even move through the menus. I have removed my daughter's account after more relentless touchscreen issues and severe lag and turned the tablet off. I have also requested a refund and will return the tablet. Hopefully this rubbish will not be sold to some other poor unsuspecting soul. My daughter was heartbroken on Christmas day because of this so huge thanks for that. Will not use this company again.UPDATE: The same issue is now affecting the tablet bought for my son. Severe lag and unresponsive touchscreen rendering the tablet practically unusable. Will be getting returned along with my daughter's.I have read other reviews that this company has not fully refunded other customers with issues like this. If this happens then I will be contacting trading standards.
